text: "Limelight" is a 1981 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush. It first appeared on their eighth studio album Moving Pictures. It went to number 55 in the United States and number 18 in Canada. It also made number 4 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. == References == Category:1981 songs Category:Arena rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Rush (band) songs
title: Limelight (Rush song)
